infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app does not directly use the camera. The document picker feature may access the camera to scan documents.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app may access your photo library to select documents or images through the document picker.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app does not use the microphone. This permission may be requested by third-party libraries.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app does not use location services. This permission may be requested by advertising libraries.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This app does not use Bluetooth. This permission may be requested by third-party libraries.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app does not access your contacts. This permission may be requested by third-party libraries.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app does not access your calendar. This permission may be requested by third-party libraries.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app does not access your reminders. This permission may be requested by third-party libraries.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This app does not use motion data. This permission may be requested by third-party libraries.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This app does not use Face ID. This permission may be requested by payment processing libraries.
